long_description: The men's REI Salix jacket is a backcountry shell that offers full-on coverage that can stand up to severe weather-it's waterproof, windproof and insulated. The rugged shell fabric is a special breathable polyester that's waterproof and windproof up to 60 mph. For added protection from the cold, the jacket is insulated with PrimaLoft(R) Eco fill, which is ultralight and thin, yet water resistant and very warm. The hood has multiple adjustments; the collar is lined with soft tricot. Outer zippers are water resistant; front zipper has a stormflap and a chin guard. Cuffs have adjustable tabs and inner cuff gaskets; adjustable hem drawcord also helps retain warmth. The men's REI Salix jacket has zip hand pockets, zip chests pockets and an inner zip chest pocket with a cord port.
short_description: The men's REI Salix jacket is a backcountry shell that offers full-on coverage that can stand up to severe weather-it's waterproof, windproof and insulated.
